hero_description: Omubeezi w'okulima akozesa AI okuwa amagezi agatuufu eri abalimi ba Uganda
disease_diagnosis_description: Zuula endwadde z'ebimera mangu nga okozesa AI okukebera ebifaananyi
weather_forecast_description: Funa okulagula kw'obudde okw'ekitundu kyo n'amagezi g'okulima
market_prices_description: Goberera ebipimo by'obutale era okwatagane n'abaguzi
sms_support_description: Kozesa empeereza zaffe okuyita mu SMS - tewetaaga internet
cta_description: Tandika okulongoosa amakungula go n'amagezi agava mu data
about_description: AgroGPT Uganda kye kifo ekikozesa AI okuyamba abalimi okukola okusalawo okulungi nga bakozesa tekinologiya ne data.
